item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 8, 2025 at 2:40 AM UTC
item.description:

25. The Inevitability of the Borrow Checker (121 points | 57 comments)

29. Meta torrented & seeded 81.7 TB dataset containing copyrighted data (1105 points | 795 comments)
